about.title: About LabIoT
about.content:
LabIoT is a solution developed to digitize and automate laboratory processes through the Internet of Things (IoT).
Its modular architecture connects sensors, devices, and users within a single platform, providing control, traceability, and real-time analytics.
LabIoT aims to provide scientific and educational institutions with a modern tool that enhances operational efficiency, data security, and technological innovation in laboratory environments.

home.title: Welcome to LabIoT
home.content:
LabIoT is an intelligent platform that integrates IoT technology for real-time monitoring and management of laboratories.
It allows you to record, visualize, and analyze sensor data such as temperature, humidity, and other critical parameters that influence experiment quality and material preservation.
With LabIoT, technical teams can optimize processes, improve traceability, and ensure stable laboratory conditions at all times.
